home.heroTitle: Make chores fun for the whole family
home.heroSubtitle: GemSteps helps kids build great habits by turning everyday tasks into an exciting game. Complete chores, earn gems, and redeem awesome rewards.
home.howItWorksSubtitle: A simple system that motivates kids and makes parents' lives easier
home.step1Desc: Parents create tasks with point values. Make it personal with fun icons and custom rewards.
home.step2Desc: Kids complete chores and watch their gems grow. Track progress with a visual calendar.
home.step3Desc: Trade gems for real rewards you choose. From screen time to special treats.
home.benefitsDesc: GemSteps teaches kids the value of hard work while making household tasks feel like an adventure.
home.benefit1: Kids learn accountability and time management
home.benefit2: Parents spend less time reminding and more time together
home.benefit3: Customizable rewards that motivate your unique child
home.ctaSubtitle: Join families who've made chores fun. Free to get started.
home.footerTagline: Making family chores fun, one gem at a time
